EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.SF_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place tomorrow in San Francisco. For those attending the Data Science Workshop, please remember to bring your own laptop.
Date: Wednesday, 25 October 2017
Time:
8:00am - 9:00am Breakfast 9:00am - 12:15pm Sessions 12:15pm - 1:15pm Lunch 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop
Location:
Pivotal San Francisco <[[https://pivotal.io/locations/san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]> 875 Howard Street, 4th floor San Francisco, CA 94103 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal/@37.7818458,-122.40615,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x808580887d690df7:0x108e933f003c99e3!8m2!3d37.7818416!4d-122.403956]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
Parking:
Uber/ Lyft is recommended. Alternatively there is a nearby parking garage is located at 899 Mission St, San Francisco, CA 94103
When you arrive take the elevators from the lobby to the 5th floor. Check in with the front desk and they will direct you down to the event space on the 4th floor. If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>. Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
